text:
EXPLANATORY NOTES ON THE NEVJ NETWORK POLICIES GOVERNING TAPE RETURNS
Since after January 1, 1957 the Network will not give tape return credit for any
programs or series issued more than six (6) months previously (except for in-school
taoes, covered elsewhere), all stations retaining tapes issued prior to Issue $27,
1956 should return those tapes before January 1 to get tape return credit#
The Network will give tape return credit for the following series from January 1,
1957 through March 31, 1957, and a similar list of acceptable return tapes will be
distributed at the beginning of each future quarter#
